properties.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Southern Westchester; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven; Northwest Suffolk
properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 24 at 3:16PM EST until January 25 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level
expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline.

* WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield and Southern New
Haven Counties. In New York, Southern Westchester,
Northwestern Suffolk and Northern Nassau Counties.

* WHEN...Between 10 AM and 3 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is expected in the more vulnerable
locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and
low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns,
and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront
will experience shallow flooding.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 3 PM EST SATURDAY
